"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5356f5496368727d50b20000#post_5356f5496368727d50b20000
It gives the government control over you phone, laptop or tablet. They can switch it off if they so desire. I killswitch can be used for good but also for evil. They should not mandatory, they should be an option. Let the people choose if they want to give control over their device to the government.

topics.body:
"@someguy111":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5356f6ab6368727b21830100#post_5356f6ab6368727b21830100
It could be used to fight crimes effectly...
But, I agree this could also be abused BADLY.

If any government have to resort to any MANDATORY measures. Then they are definitely up to something not good, or doing something wrong. Yes, and it should be a choice of the citizens whether they want such or not.
